actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Federal Election Commission through June 30, 1976 and to make certain technical and conforming changes made necessary by the Federal Election Campaign Act Amendments of 1974.

summary.text: Authorizes to be appropriated an amount not to exceed $10,000,0000 for fiscal year 1976 for the Federal Election Commission. Makes specified technical changes to the Federal Election Campaign Act required by the Federal Election Campaign Act Amendments of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Federal Election Commission through June 30, 1976 and to make certain technical and conforming changes made necessary by the Federal Election Campaign Act Amendments of 1974.
